title: Who needs the computer?
creator_credit: Peter Bradford, EMI/Parlophone, Bill Sewell and Philip Harland
brief_description: An animated film designed to explore some of the common misconceptions about the computer. Suitable for senior management, computer users, systems analysts and trainees and is intended to form a sound basis for subsequent group discussions.
creator_credit_for_label: Peter Bradford, EMI/Parlophone, Bill Sewell and Philip Harland
